rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.
special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
II – Until end of turn, up to one target creature you control gets +1/+1 for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
III – You gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
